Title: As a player, I want to be able to start a new game from the first level to begin playing.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to be able to restart the current level to start from the beginning.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to be able to undo the last move to correct mistakes.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to be able to save my progress in the current game to continue later.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to be able to load a previously saved game to resume my progress.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to be able to load different levels with unique boards for a varied experience.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want the boards to be displayed correctly on the game screen.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want the levels to be validated, and an error message shown if there are any issues.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want the completion of a level to be automatically detected, and the next level to be loaded.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to see the current status of the board, the moves made, and the current score on the game screen.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want all the moves made to be recorded, allowing me to undo them and backtrack in the game.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to receive a congratulatory message and see my final score when I have completed all the levels.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: As a player, I want to be able to close the application from the game menu.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The system will have different levels and each one will increase the difficulty. Each one will have a different board
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The board is divided in squares and will have this items in it: Wall, Red Car, Other vehicles and Parking Exit
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: Two or more consecuitve wall/vehicle will have the aspect of being only one. Both of them cannot be traversed
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The level will be completed when the red car exit the parking.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: All vehicles will move forwards or backwards but not laterally
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: Design several levels with its respective format. The system will be able to detect if the level is not in the correct format
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: Design the punctuation level. This will be determined by the number of movements
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The app will show a message when the level is completed and will show the punctuation obtained
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The app will display a HUD around the board that will provide some information to the user.
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The system will allow the user to undo all the movements that has done
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The system will allow the user to save his progress in the level, so the user can restore the progress
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA

Title: The application will have a game menu
Author: PÉREZ UPIERRE, SALMA
